creator: rvg@creato.org
text:
Say I create an "HTTP request defaults" Config parameter.  In this I specify a
default server name.  When I subsequently try to add an HTTP request sampler in
a context where this config element is applicable, I would like to see the
default values applicable to the Request.  For example, the screen could show
the default values while still allowing the user to override these defaults. 
Where the defaults have been overriden, the default value could be shown greyed-out.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Seems to me this would need every field on the screen to be doubled-up.

The default could be shown in a Help Tip instead.

Changing to enhancement.
